jobDescription: Develop and maintain user-facing features using React.js, build reusable components, translate designs into code, optimize components for performance, work on backend development with Node.js and Express.js, and implement security and data protection measures.
preferredQualifications: Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
